name: Rachel Lascalla
summary: Executive Assistant with sales experience, skilled at multitasking, meticulous attention to detail, and strong communication. Experienced in calendaring, travel arrangements, onboarding, meeting planning, and process improvement.

experience.title: Sales
experience.description: Coordinated customer facing webinars, including developing relationships with vendors, tracking customer attendance and post-webinar follow-up.

experience.title: Freelance
experience.description: Arranged travel, visas, agendas and necessary contacts; maintained and coordinated executive and senior management schedules; wrote and distributed meeting minutes; coordinated customer facing webinars; managed desktop publishing and proposal/memo typing.

experience.title: Executive Assistant
experience.description: Sole assistant for Eastern half of North America; managed calendars, travel arrangements (international and domestic), expense reports, and vendor logistics; prepared marketing documentation; scheduled and supported meetings and events; coordinated webinars and cross-departmental projects.

experience.title: Supervisor
experience.description: Oversaw staff ranging from 2-10 employees per shift; conducted sales segmentation and research, utilizing revenue data and market factors to drive RTD sales.
